item.title: Acknowledgments
item.description: Acknowledgments Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Links to original docs: https://developer.okta.com/books/api-security/acknowledgments/ Structure type: Concept Content type: Integration guide An integration guide or coding guide illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code. It is similar to a how-to but the focus is more technical and geared towards developers integrating an SDK, API, or another library into their applications.
